list.title: Promo Grand Opening: Heavy Equipment Purchase (All Types) Up to IDR 1 Billion
list.description: THEI Grand Opening Promo! Get up to 30% discount on heavy equipment purchases and enjoy 7 total exclusive bonuses, including VIP services, operator training, and a premium corporate gift package.

details.title: Free Priority Card for Company Maintenance Service
details.description: Priority card for company machine maintenance services valued up to IDR 250,000,000.

details.title: Free Corporate Gift Pack Valued at IDR 3,000,000
details.description: Exclusive corporate gift package containing: Exclusive THEI Jacket, 1L Stainless Tumbler, Custom Logo Safety Hat, Premium Notebook & Metal Pen, IDR 500,000 Service Voucher, Certificate + Handover Board, and Exclusive Flower Bouquet.

details.title: Discount on Heavy Equipment Purchase (All Types) Up to 30%
details.description: Purchase discount for heavy equipment valued at IDR 20,000,000 (Points 3 and 4 on the image have the same value).

details.title: Free Operator Training for Jabodetabek Area Until Proficient
details.description: Comprehensive operator training in the Jabodetabek area until proficiency is achieved, valued at IDR 5,000,000.

details.title: FREE Delivery for Jabodetabek Area
details.description: Free delivery of the unit across the entire Jabodetabek area, valued at IDR 2,000,000.

details.title: Bonus Value Add THEI Concept (VIP After-Sales)
details.description: VIP after-sales service from THEI, including Periodic Inspection and Additional Work Warranty, valued at IDR 5,000,000.

list.title: Promo Exclusive Grade (Min. 1 Machine Purchase)
list.description: Exclusive Grade Promo: The most complete service and inspection package for a minimum purchase of 1 machine, valued at IDR 250,000,000. This package includes a 50% parts discount, 16 key services (like Tune-Up, Detailing, & 100x Car Wash), and 6 unlimited inspection services.

details.title: 50% Spare Parts Discount
details.description: Enjoy massive savings on all spare parts purchases outside the bonus package.

details.title: FREE Unlimited Engine Scanner
details.description: Use as much as you need for accurate, on-demand engine diagnostics.

details.title: Tune Up 65 Components + Carbon Cleaner
details.description: Keeps your machine in top performance (Service 6x per year).

details.title: FREE Super Complete Undercarriage Service
details.description: Ensures vehicle comfort and safety (Service 6x per year).

details.title: FREE Flinkoat Anti-Rust Undercarriage
details.description: Provides corrosion protection (Service 3x per year).

details.title: FREE Quick Service by TJM Express
details.description: Quick and efficient maintenance (Service 6x per year).

details.title: FREE Glass Coating Treatment
details.description: Improves visibility and protects glass (Service 3x per year).

details.title: FREE Unlimited Spooring (1 Year)
details.description: Ensures stability and safety, unlimited for 1 full year.

details.title: FREE Car Wash Snow
details.description: Keeps your machine clean (Service 100x per year).

details.title: FREE Super Cold Extra AC Service
details.description: Maintains optimal cabin temperature (Service 6x per year).

details.title: FREE Unlimited Fogging & Disinfectant
details.description: Ensures a clean and hygienic cabin (Unlimited service).

details.title: FREE Full Interior & Exterior Detailing
details.description: Keeps your machine looking new (Service 6x per year).

details.title: FREE Radiator Ultra Flush
details.description: Ensures optimal engine cooling (Service 4x per year).

details.title: FREE Unlimited Battery Maintenance & Fogging Terminal
details.description: Unlimited service to ensure battery health and reliability.

details.title: FREE Body & Paint Touch Up
details.description: Keeps your machine's body pristine (Service 2x per year).

details.title: FREE Nano Coating and Full Detailing
details.description: Provides superior protection and shine (Service 2x per year).

list.title: Promo Grand Opening: Heavy Equipment Rental (All Types) Up to IDR 100 Million
list.description: THEI Grand Opening Rental Promo! Get a discount up to IDR 50 million and numerous value-added benefits, including 24/7 service, unit replacement guarantee, and comprehensive safety & legal documentation.

details.title: Heavy Equipment Rental Discount up to IDR 50,000,000
details.description: Significant discount available (Terms and Conditions apply).

details.title: All Value Added Benefits Included
details.description: Access to all premium extra benefits offered.

details.title: FREE Unit Pick-up & Delivery
details.description: Complimentary transportation service for the unit.

details.title: SLA < 3 Hours + 24/7 Service Truck
details.description: Service Level Agreement response time under 3 hours, supported by 24/7 Service Truck availability.

details.title: Unit Replacement Guarantee
details.description: Guarantee for a unit replacement if needed to ensure business continuity.

details.title: IoT & GPS Monitoring + Monthly Report
details.description: Real-time tracking with IoT & GPS, and provision of monthly usage reports.

details.title: Complete K3 Documents & Legality
details.description: Provision of complete Occupational Health & Safety (K3) documents and full legal compliance.

details.title: Complete Safety Kit
details.description: Includes: APAR (Fire Extinguisher), Helmet, Safety Shoes, Vest, and Goggles.

details.title: VIP Hotline 24/7
details.description: Round-the-clock priority support line.

details.title: Customer Logo Branding on Unit (3 Month Contract)
details.description: Free branding of the customer's logo on the rented unit for contracts of 3 months or more.

list.title: Promo Grand Opening: Heavy Equipment Trade-In (All Types) Up to IDR 100 Million

details.title: Trade-In Discount Up to IDR 50,000,000

details.title: FREE Dozens of Old Unit Inspection Points (Jabodetabek Area)

details.title: Value Add THEI Trade-In Services
details.description: Includes: **Fast Estimation**, **Digital Inspection Report**, and **FREE Old Unit Pick-up**.

collaboration.title: More Than Just Service. This Is a Partnership.
collaboration.description: Our collaboration program is designed to provide maximum benefits for our loyal partners, ensuring your fleet is always in prime condition with priority support.

testimonial.title: Our Partner's Success Story
testimonial.quote: This collaboration program truly changed how we manage our fleet. The priority service and bonuses have significantly helped our operational efficiency.
testimonial.name: Dewi Anggraini

main_cta.title: Ready to Become a Priority Partner and Enjoy All the Benefits?
